title: TPACK-Based Simulation Education for Enhancing Information Literacy Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and experience in searching job-related documents
context.additional_context: Scenario-based training linked to workplace environments for working professionals, incorporating personal device usage and real-time feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search for reliable information in three or more academic databases
Learners can evaluate the source, bias, and timeliness of information in a VR simulation environment to determine its appropriateness
Learners can synthesize and analyze evaluated information according to work scenarios and reorganize it into a report format
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
